metadata.title: Our Partners | Mythoria
metadata.description: Find Mythoria partners for printing, attractions, and retail perks near you. Looking to collaborate? Apply to join the Mythoria Alliance.
metadata.ogDescription: Locate printing services, attractions, and retail partners bringing Mythoria stories to life. Businesses can apply to join.
metadata.twitterDescription: Find printing services, attractions, and retail partners. Businesses can apply to join the Mythoria Alliance.

hero.title: Our Partners
hero.subtitle: From your screen to your hands.
hero.body: The story doesn’t end when you click "Save." We’ve teamed up with local experts to help you print your books, discover new adventures, and unlock exclusive rewards. Find the closest spot to bring your Mythoria creation to life.

b2b.title: Join the Mythoria Alliance
b2b.body: We are growing fast and we need partners on the ground. If you have a business that serves families, let’s collaborate. You get traffic, we get happy users. It’s a classic win-win plotline.

form.title: Ready to Join the Story?
form.subtitle: Let's start the conversation. Fill out the form and our partnership team will get in touch.
